column4: i am working with something like this for the boot records " sudo dd if=/dev/sda1 bs=512 count=1 | nc ip port" on the side i want to copy and " nc -l -p 777 | dd bs=512 count=1 of=boot.img
i am trying to make an image over network
is this on the right track
I think you will need something like    "sudo mount -t auto /dev/sr0 <mount point>"
